post.body: - Turn that frown around! Good seeing you tonight, btw!
- Puff puff give... stop fvckin up the rotation! > http://cli.gs/EN8DG7
- True dat.
- I may do some "white boy" moves... although I'm not 100% sure what that means? Perhaps a demo of my pop-locking skillz?
- Might be a lost cause. Guess just do a clean install and kiss the data good by. Sucks, hope you made some previous backups.
- But be careful of the data u back up. It could be infected. Should probably scan it before reloading it to laptop.
- Oh. Well, if it's really bad, I'd try to backup the data I really cared about then do a clean install of windows.
- I'm not saying I could fix it but out of curiosity, what was wrong w/ the laptop? I might have some ideas.
- I dugg it but your article needs controversy, pirates, ninjas or ipods to get to the top of digg. Just sayin...
- I could see ur point if someone spammed non-stop about it. But if they do it one time? I don't see the problem.
I nominate @turd_furguson in category #entertainment because he is retarded. > http://cli.gs/SYRamT
I nominate @ColonelTribune in category #news because Rod Blagojevich told me to do it. And *Bleep* all these other guys!
- No, I'm not there any more. Got the chili cheese fries. Sure I'll regret it at some point.
- Hands down, Amy Winehouse. Kinda sucks cause she used to be pretty. Crack is a hell of a drug.
- Build a mote with little gingerbread alligators!
- Tell ur friends to stop snoozin...
- Dude, that's hardcore.
- I'll will. Putting it on my list now. Thanks!
- I believe you. I know I don't have proper context. I'll read up on it...
- Sorry I'm staying home. I have strong 'follow through' on the commitments I make.
- You can't tell me to "man up" & in the same tweet use the word "tookus".
- "Sooooo... it's Friday. How do you feel about the non-snowpocalypse? Yes. Ok. Thank you. But anyway..."
- Where is your fancy snowpocalypse?!?!
- True dat!
- I actually work in Des Plaines... so that would be even worse. Yeah, no real regrets.
- Good luck!
- Awesome! I'm going to go investigate that theory pretty soon. lol. Happy New Year, btw!
- Thank you! And I'm discovering that I'm not hung over... not sure how this is possible.
- That works! Nothing wrong with a little morning bubbly.
- Happy New Years to you too! Think I'm still in need of sleep...
- Oddly enough I can't remember how either ended. I may need to see them again to have a competent discussion on the subject. :/
- Yeah, thumbs down on Hulk dogs. Now Hulk frogs... that's another story! Like maybe a John Carpenter story. ;P
- Wassup! Happy Newest of Years! If @TheFemGeek says you're a "cool dude" then I'm sold. Welcome to Twitter!
- I thought the first Hulk looked on par w/ Scoobie Doo movie.
- True. And I'm no special effects guy but I also thought the new Hulk looked more realistically fit to the surroundings.
- Thought newer Hulk looked better and thought story was more interesting. But never really compared the 2 back to back...
- You gonna shoot the fish?
- I'm lovin' the SEO turrets!
RT: @UtahSEOpro - America: Freedom to Fascism documentary to air on PBS Dec 14. Must SEE documentary! http://tinyurl.com/6ygajr
I'm still not sure how I won the "ugly sweater contest". But I want to thank all the people I bribed. ;P
Cool Tweetup tonight. Thank you twitter for allowing such interesting and cool people to randomly hang out! And Happy Bday to @Mav_rick!
This guy needs a Wikipedia page... > http://cli.gs/U6LVZQ (Alex Bellini, Italian dude who rowed across Pacific Ocean)
Don't think last tweet got across how amazed I am that 'Electric Ladyland' is only a $2. I'm mind blown. http://cli.gs/M8gtQ1
Greatest Album ever made on Sale @ Amazon for $1.99 > http://cli.gs/M8gtQ1 (Electric Ladyland)
I haven't done a backup in awhile. I should get on that...
Weird, I just got a wrong number call... from Leona's! They are beckoning me!!!
http://twitpic.com/ualr - Joe parks in snow embankment at Max's Italian Beef on Western.
Congress gets a raise. Awesome. They so totally deserve it. Good job selling out America. Was fun while it lasted. > http://cli.gs/AgEBAq
Sorry the guy died, but 'Deep Throat' might possibly be the worst alias name of all time.
Lost 4 socks in the laundry. I think that's a new record.
I think all Chicago weather news people should be fired. They completely mis-represented the snowpocalypse. Amy Freeze I'm lookin' at you!
It's snowing again...
Is anything open today? Grocery stores, restaurants, etc?
Ok... so going back to sleep didn't work. Guess I'm awake. That probably means I should do something...
Fearing part of today when I actually start to feel what I did last night. I know I helped drink a lot of this... http://twitpic.com/ylib
Why are you all awake and talking about manservants?
So... it's 2009. Awesome! Let's talk again when you've all sobered up.
Ok... time to take a power nap. > http://tinyurl.com/9xsq7q
Wish I had a Hawaiian shirt. Nothing says you're ready to party like a Hawaiian shirt.
Fighting off a nap attack. > http://tinyurl.com/2952kw
